description: Pretty much the best subtitle viewer/editor available for GNOME 3.

I've fixed probably about 100 movies with this program. Syncing a movie takes only a minute or less once you know how to do it. Never had a hiccup.

Someone said that you cannot view movies in it. That's incorrect in my experience. You need to download the proper codecs. I've never had a movie not load for me.

What sets this program apart from many others is its 'transform' option that allows you to fix subtitled programs that have stretched or shrunken times, which is extremely common with srt files for some reason.

Excellent program. Had to comment because 3/5 stars doesn't do it justice.
summary: Excellent subtitle program—handles everything I throw at it
